text: Aur naam-e-aemaal samney rakh diye jayen gay. Pus tu dekhay ga kay gunhegar iss ki tehreer say khofzada horahey hongay aur keh rahey hongay haaye humari kharabi yeh kaisi kitab hai jiss ney koi chota bara baghair gheray kay baqi hi nahi chora aur jo kuch enhon ney kiya tha sab mojood payen gay aur tera rab kissi per zulm-o-sitam na keray ga
